column5: I just picked one of these reels up as I wanted to try float fishing without a large investment. It seems pretty decent to me 120.00 tax in. Does anybody else have one and how do you like it?

spins easily, but in every one ive felt there a definite "knock" in it as it turns which looks like its from poor manufacturing if you watch the center you'll see a wobble. or at least thats what ive experienced
I knew a guy who crafted his own centerpin from a clothesline wheel. It'll work!
